page.title: 06GALA WEEK,FORT AUGUSTUS(2).
page.content: After a week of various activities the chief attractions take place on the Saturday. The days events open with a parade of decorated floats through the village.Then everyone gathers at the { {Abbey School }cricket field for the chief events.These include children's races,waiters' race,terrier racing,putting the shot,tossing the caber and tug-o-war. At the end of the day's activities, the various trophies and prizes are presented to the lucky winners, and the raffles are drawn. In the evening there is usually musical entertainment or dancing in the local hotels. All the profits for the week are distributed among local charities.
